CustomField.formula: IF( AND(vlocity_cmt__StartDateTime__c <= NOW(), vlocity_cmt__IsEnabled__c, OR(vlocity_cmt__EndDateTime__c > NOW(), ISNULL(vlocity_cmt__EndDateTime__c))) , "Active", IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(vlocity_cmt__EndDateTime__c) ), vlocity_cmt__EndDateTime__c <= NOW(), vlocity_cmt__IsEnabled__c), "Expired", IF( AND(vlocity_cmt__EndDateTime__c > NOW(), vlocity_cmt__IsEnabled__c) , "Pending", "Inactive") ) )
CustomField.label: Current Status
